TopicTitle: How to take steam screenshots without that Aerodynamic Forces Overlay text Getting in the way

Articles.Content:
Title says all

Edited May 31, 2015 by Dspan_000

You could change the screenshot key in the Steam settings from F12 to something unused.

In order to do that, click on Steam (button in upper right hand corner) > Settings >In-Game > and there should be a section that pertains to changing the screenshot key.

I hope this helps and all the best.
F1 is the screenshot hotkey from game itself if you don't want to change Steam settings.

F1 is the screenshot hotkey from game itself if you don't want to change Steam settings.

ah. Where does the game save its screenshots?

ah. Where does the game save its screenshots?

Steam > steamapps > common > Kerbal Space Program > Screenshots
